author: Kate Gibson
title: Hobby Lobby reopens as "essential business" despite stay-at-home orders
description: Arts-and-crafts retailer defies mandates to curb the pandemic's spread, saying it sells mask and education supplies.
content: Hobby Lobby is reopening stores in areas with stay-at-home orders in place, arguing that it's an "essential" business as it sells educational and make-your-own mask supplies, along with products for at-home small businesses. The arts-and-crafts retail chain's… [+3820 chars]
